title: The first AI government minister
description: FLORENCE, Italy — When Albanian Prime Minister Edi Rama recently announced his new Cabinet, it was not his choice of finance minister or foreign minister that gained the most attention. The biggest news was Rama’s appointment of an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered bot as the new minister of public procurement.
